attributes.action: Add the British National Anthem to the National Curriculum
attributes.additional_details: In the United States of America most people know there national anthem or have at least been taught it. In France they are being taught it. A country such as our own should also be proud of our national song.
attributes.background: The national anthem should unite the country and take pride in our historic royal family, but in this day and age not many people understand the anthem. The national anthem could be used in times of crisis to show unity and bring back the British spirit.
